title: Readout of the Vice President's Meeting with Crown Prince Salman Bin Hamad Al Khalifa of Bahrain | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Vice President


For Immediate Release
May 11, 2012

 



Readout of the Vice President's Meeting with Crown Prince Salman Bin Hamad Al Khalifa of Bahrain




Vice President Biden met this afternoon with Crown Prince Salman Bin Hamad Al Khalifa of Bahrain. The Vice President reaffirmed the United Statesâ€™ commitment to our long-standing partnership with the Government of Bahrain and discussed with the Crown Prince steps to strengthen those ties. The Vice President expressed concern about the recent escalation of street violence, including attacks against security forces. The Vice President also underscored the importance of ensuring fundamental rights for all Bahrainis and the need for greater progress by the government on accountability for past abuses, police reform and integration, and inclusive political dialogue.
